# Gross Domestic Product of Pernambuco in 2013
```{r}
# Reads data
gdp <- read.csv2(file = "data/gdp_geo.csv")

# Normalizes GDP data from 1 to 30
radius_gdp <- 39 * (gdp$GDP_per_capita - min(gdp$GDP_per_capita)) /
    (max(gdp$GDP_per_capita) - min(gdp$GDP_per_capita)) + 1

# Creates and displays map
my_map <- leaflet() %>% 
    addTiles() %>%
    fitBounds(-40, -4, -32, -8) %>%
    addCircleMarkers(lng = gdp$long, lat = gdp$lat, color = "blue", 
                     radius = radius_gdp)
my_map
```
